issue.title: [fund.ts.v2] Non-member swap for propagate_const should call member swap

discussion.p: For consistency with the rest of the standard library, the non-member swap for propagate_const should call member swap.
Both P3 and NAD were suggested.

Feedback from an implementation:
The implementation of propagate_const in libstdc++ calls propagate_const's member swap from the non-member swap.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4529.

blockquote.pre: -1- template <class T> constexpr void swap(propagate_const<T>& pt1, propagate_const<T>& pt2) noexcept(see below)

blockquote.p:
-2- The constant-expression in the exception-specification is noexcept(swap(pt1.t_, pt2.t_)pt1.swap(pt2)).
-3- Effects: swap(pt1.t_, pt2.t_)pt1.swap(pt2).
